```{r}

# convenience function
plot_kable <- function(model_fit, file){
  
  fixed <- round(summary(model_fit)$fixed, 3) %>%
    as_tibble()
  
  family <- round(summary(model_fit)$spec_pars, 3) %>%
    as_tibble()
  
  rbind(fixed, family) %>%
    kbl() %>%
    kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
    as_image(width = 8, file = file)
  
}

# now plot/save them 
plot_kable(
  m_pooled_strict_fit,
  "../plots_R/pooled_strict_summary.png"
  )

plot_kable(
  m_pooled_reasonable_fit,
  "../plots_R/pooled_reasonable_summary.png"
  )

plot_kable(
  m_pooled_vague_fit, 
  "../plots_R/pooled_vague_summary.png"
  )


```
